casebody.data:
Felix Miranda v. Warden, State Prison (9602)

Spallone, O’Connell and Cretella, Js.

Submitted on briefs June 7 decision released July 2, 1991 Felix Miranda, pro se, the appellant (petitioner) filed a brief. JohnM. Bailey, state’s attorney, and Scott Murphy, assistant state’s attorney, and Jack W. Fischer, deputy assistant state’s attorney filed a brief for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
